tag.description: ID of an item tag. Will be ignored if `item` is set.
tag.markdownDescription: ID of an item tag. Will be ignored if `item` is set.

type.description:
[Data Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/ingredient)

_Either_: an [Object](object.md) specifying a registered item or item tag.

_Or_: an [Array](array.md) of [Objects](object.md) specifying a registered item or item tag.
type.markdownDescription:
[Data Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/ingredient)

_Either_: an [Object](object.md) specifying a registered item or item tag.

_Or_: an [Array](array.md) of [Objects](object.md) specifying a registered item or item tag.
